title: Susan Khon Pen
resume: Frangipani (Yui G Noonan) inherited and owned textile mills and many other business affairs after her husband died. She went on to marry Life (James Taylor) whom other women fell in love with and became obsessed with him. She entrusted her affairs and believed that he loved her. The story continues with all of the exciting drama tied in with a Thai lakorn.
